weapon_description: A statue carved in the shape of an eagle, a sacred relic of the Masters of the Night-Wind that has been passed down from generation to generation.
weapon_skill_description: Increases Elemental Mastery by 200. Gain the "Mirror of Night" effect within 15s after the equipping character creates a shield: The current active party member deals 56% increased DMG to nearby opponents. You can gain the "Mirror of Night" effect once every 14s.
